src:
Ponsel Berkamera 108 MP Pertama di Dunia Resmi Dirilis
06 Nov 2019, 06:31 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Xiaomi

Jakarta - Xiaomi resmi merilis Mi CC9 Pro. Ini menjadikannya ponsel pertama di dunia yang punya kamera 108 MP.Vendor asal China ini menyematkan lima kamera di bagian belakang lengkap dengan dua LED Flash. Kamera utamanya berukuran 108 MP menggunakan sensor Samsung ISOCELL Bright HMX.Kamera utama ini berukuran 1/1,33 inch dengan aperture f/1.69, dan 4-axis OIS. Pada edisi reguler punya lensa 7P, sementara edisi premium lensa 8P. Xiaomi turut menempatkan kamera 20 MP wide-angle mencapai 117 derajat. Serta lensa telephoto 12 MP dengan optical zoom 2X, lensa telephoto 5M (upscale ke 8 MP) dengan optical zoom 5x dan digital zoom 50X, serta kamera makro 2 MP.


Foto: GSM Arena

Mi CC9 PRo hadir dengan bentangan layar 6,47 inch dengan resolusi Full HD+ dan panel Super AMOLED. Di bagian atasnya terdapat notch tetesan air sebagai rumah bagi kamera selfie berukuran 32 MP dengan aperture f/2.0.Xiaomi memodali ponsel barunya ini dengan dapur pacu Snapdragon 730G. Kapasitas baterainya pun jumbo, 5.260 mAh.Dibekali teknologi pengisian cepat 30W. Menjanjikan pengisian 58% hanya 30 menit dan 100% dalam tempo 65 menit.


Foto: Xiaomi

Ponsel ini menjalankan MIUI 11 berbasis Android Pie. Hadir dalam pilihan warna Aurora Green, Glacier White, Midnight Black.Xiaomi sudah membuka pemesanan awal di China. Namun baru dijual 11 November mendatang. Mi CC9 Pro dibanderol sebagai berikut:- RAM 6 GB/ROM 128 GB 2.799 yuan atau Rp 5,6 juta- RAM 8 GB/ROM 256 GB 3.099 yuan atau Rp 6,2 juta- Edisi Premium RAM 8 GB/ ROM 256 3.499 atau Rp 7 juta Simak Video "''Membumi'' Jadi Kunci Xiaomi Gaet 24 Juta Pengguna di Tanah Air"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/afr)
text:
The World's First 108 MP Camera Phone Officially Released
Nov 6 2019, 06:31 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Xiaomi

Jakarta - Xiaomi officially released Mi CC9 Pro. This makes it the first mobile phone in the world to have a 108 MP camera. This vendor from China has five cameras on the back complete with two LED flashes. Its main camera measures 108 MP using a Samsung ISOCELL Bright HMX sensor. This main camera measures 1 / 1.33 inch with an aperture of f / 1.69, and 4-axis OIS. The regular edition has a 7P lens, while the premium edition 8P lens. Xiaomi also put a 20 MP wide-angle camera reaches 117 degrees. And a 12 MP telephoto lens with 2X optical zoom, 5M telephoto lens (upscale to 8 MP) with 5x optical zoom and 50X digital zoom, and 2 MP macro camera.


Photo: GSM Arena

Mi CC9 PRo comes with a 6.47 inch screen with Full HD + resolution and Super AMOLED panel. At the top there is a water droplet notch as a home for a 32 MP selfie camera with an f / 2.0 aperture. Xiaomi is capitalizing this new phone with the Snapdragon 730G runway kitchen. The capacity of the battery is jumbo, 5,260 mAh. Equipped with 30W fast charging technology. Promising 58% charging in only 30 minutes and 100% within 65 minutes.


Photo: Xiaomi

This phone runs MIUI 11 based on Android Pie. Present in the choice of colors Aurora Green, Glacier White, Midnight Black. Xiaomi has opened pre-orders in China. But only sold November 11 next. Mi CC9 Pro is priced as follows: - 6 GB RAM / ROM 128 GB 2,799 yuan or Rp 5.6 million - RAM 8 GB / ROM 256 GB 3,099 yuan or Rp 6.2 million - Premium Edition 8 GB RAM / 256 3,499 RAM or Rp. 7 million Watch Video "" Grounded "So the Key of Xiaomi Gaet 24 Million Users in the Country" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (afr / afr)
